moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury & Torts
    We strive to make a difference in the lives of injured people and their grieving families who have suffered because of the negligence or wrongful acts of others.
  • Workers Compensation
    If you have been injured on the job and need assistance with your workers' compensation claim, the Goings Law Firm, LLC is here to be your advocate.
  • Automobile & Trucking Accidents
    The Goings Law Firm, LLC has significant experience in all types of automobile and trucking accidents, including bicycle and motorcycle injuries.
  • Products Liability
    You can rely on this firm for experienced, effective legal representation if you have been injured by a dangerous or defective product or are a business that has been accused of marketing or selling such product.
  • Business Litigation
    The Goings Law Firm represents corporate and individual clients in business disputes in state and federal courts and before arbitration panels.
  • South Carolina Damages, S.C. Bar- Contributing Author, Damages in South Carolina, 2009

description:
Located in historic Columbia, South Carolina, the Goings Law Firm, LLC, is a practice dedicated to providing clients with attentive and compassionate legal representation in a variety of personal injury practice areas. We are experienced attorneys who provide practical and creative solutions while zealously representing our client's best interests.

As lawyers offering a diverse range of representation, we assist clients in matters of personal injury law; our services include workers' compensation, product liability, auto accidents, wrongful death, slip and fall, defective products, insurance, medical malpractice and property damage. Equipped with the knowledge and experience to bargain with the prosecution or advance a case through the process of complex litigation, our lawyers will be your ally from the free initial consultation to the moment a resolution is reached.

At the Goings Law Firm, LLC, we understand the trauma and anxiety that follows a major accident or injury. That is why we strive to offer compassionate representation that stems from a client-focused approach. With experience representing plaintiffs and defendants in myriad cases, our legal team is able to anticipate the opposition's strategies, while custom tailoring our services to better serve our clients.

If you, a loved one or a family member has been involved in an accident or been injured due to the negligence of another, contact our experienced and dedicated attorneys. We will advocate on your behalf while passionately fighting for your rights and compensation.
